Title: Provides that the commissioner of health may exempt certain brand name drugs so that they fall under medical assistance umbrella
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of health may exempt certain brand name drugs so that they fall under medical assistance umbrella.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to certain medical assistance for needy persons
